name: Carbon Copy Cloner Task Configuration
summary: A CCCTASK file is a task created by Bombich Software Carbon Copy Cloner, a Mac backup application. It contains instructions that Carbon Copy Cloner uses to back up all or part of the data stored on a user's hard drive . CCCTASK files are stored in the Macintosh HD/​Library/​Application Support/​com.bombich.ccc directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: CCCTASK file open in Bombich Software Carbon Copy Cloner
